statements.name: PROC SCAPROC
statements.description: Specifies that SAS will run the SAS Code Analyzer with your SAS job.

statements.name: RECORD
statements.description: Specifies a filename or a fileref to contain the output of the SAS Code Analyzer.

arguments.name: filespec
arguments.description: specifies a physical filename in quotation marks, or a fileref, that indicates a file to contain the output of the SAS Code Analyzer. The output is the original SAS source and comments that contain information about the job. For more information about the output comments, see .

arguments.name: ATTR
arguments.description: writes additional information about the variables in the input data sets and views.

arguments.name: OPENTIMES
arguments.description: writes the open time, size, and physical filename of the input data sets.

arguments.name: INTCON
arguments.description: outputs information about table integrity constraints.

arguments.name: EXPANDMACROS
arguments.description: expands macro invocations into separate tasks.

arguments.name: filespec
arguments.description: specifies a physical filename in quotation marks, or a fileref, that points to a file that will contain the output of the Grid Job Generator.

arguments.name: RESOURCE
arguments.description: specifies the resource to use in the grdsvs_enable function call. The default is SASApp.

arguments.name: INHERITLIB
arguments.description: adds INHERITLIB=(USER) to the SIGNON statements in the grid-enabled job. By default, the user library (if one is specified) is assigned in each remote session.

arguments.name: NOOPTIMIZE
arguments.description: disables the combining and reordering of tasks for grid-enabled jobs.

statements.name: WRITE
statements.description: Specifies output information to the record file.
